node.title: Victorian Opposition Leader stands by demand for drink-driving MP Tim Smith to leave Kew seat
node.alt: A composite image of close-up profile photographs of Matthew Guy and Tim Smith.
node.description: Victorian Opposition Leader Matthew Guy is standing by his public demand that embattled Kew MP Tim Smith not contest next year's state election.
node.content:
["Victorian Opposition Leader Matthew Guy is standing by his public demand that embattled Kew MP Tim Smith not contest next year's state election.", "Mr Smith resigned from shadow cabinet after he crashed his car on Saturday night while more than two times over the legal blood-alcohol limit.", "Mr Guy has strongly condemned the crash and on Tuesday told reporters\u00a0he had \"made it clear\" he did not want his Liberal colleague to nominate for preselection.\u00a0", "In a press conference on Wednesday which lasted for more than an hour,\u00a0Mr Smith refused to directly answer questions about whether Mr Guy had told him to resign.", "Instead, Mr Smith answered dozens of repeated questions from reporters by saying Mr Guy had asked him to \"reflect\" on his position.", "He refused to rule out running for preselection for the November 2022 election, suggesting he had\u00a0support within the party to stay in the seat. He will speak to branch members in Kew before making a decision ahead of preselections closing next Friday.", "", "
Tim Smith refuses to say if Matthew Guy told him not to recontest the next election.
", "This afternoon, Mr Guy said he would not be drawn on Mr Smith's epic press conference or the specifics of private conversations other than to say: \"What I said, I stand by.\"", "Former prime minister Tony Abbott, who struggled for popularity in Victoria during his term, backed Mr Smith to stay in the job.", "\"Our party needs more fighting spirit, especially in Victoria, and Tim is the one state Liberal MP who has most consistently and effectively attacked the Andrews government,\" Mr Abbott told The Australian newspaper.", "Mr Abbott said the one incident should not disqualify \"one of our best Victorian talents\" from sitting in parliament.", "\"I'm not here to comment on Tony Abbott or anyone else,'' Mr\u00a0Guy told reporters today.", "
Physical and metaphorical car crashes leave opposition under pressure
", "Mr Smith's continued defiance is undermining Mr Guy's authority as leader.", "Many of Mr Smith's colleagues have told him to retire, some even suggesting he could make a political comeback in the future, given he is only 38.", "The physical and metaphorical car crashes of the week are a major distraction for the Coalition, after it enjoyed one its best weeks in opposition leading fierce criticism of the government's pandemic laws.", "Support for the embattled Kew MP is drying up, with allies now coming to the conclusion his position is no longer tenable.", "", "
Nobody was injured in the Hawthorn crash, and Mr Smith has offered to pay for a damaged fence.(ABC News)
", "There is\u00a0also a concern about the damage Mr Smith's ongoing presence in the\u00a0party is doing to party's vote in the federal seat of Kooyong, held by Treasurer Josh Frydenberg.", "Both Kew and Kooyong suffered swings against the Liberals at the last elections. Kew in particular\u00a0is not the safe seat it once was, with some more anxious Liberals worried it could fall like the neighbouring seat of Hawthorn did in 2018.", "Mr Frydenberg today told Sky News Mr Smith had been\u00a0a \"very strong advocate for his local community\".", "Mr Frydenberg said Mr Smith should be \"given the space\" to decide whether to bow out of the 2022 race, but did not directly answer questions about whether he should stay in office.", "
Guy 'quite sure' his stance will be supported by preselectors
", "Preselection nominations close next Friday but there is a push for the party's powerful administrative committee to extended the period for Kew nominations to give potential candidates more time to throw their hats\u00a0into the ring.", "Shadow Treasurer David Davis had been linked to a move to the lower house, but on Thursday said he was happy in his current role in the upper house.", "Shadow Health Minister Georgie Crozier said there were a number of strong prospective candidates, including people from outside the party who were fed up with the government and\u00a0wanted to get involved in the Liberal Party.", "If Mr Smith does nominate, there are\u00a0also discussions about whether the party's candidate endorsement process would allow him to run.", "If Mr Smith's fate was decided by the party, not preselectors in Kew, it could create further tension in a party already riven by factional disputes.", "Today, Mr Guy said he was \"quite sure\" the administrative committee responsible for preselection in Kew would be supportive of his view that Mr Smith should not recontest.", "On Saturday the admin committee is meeting to choose a new MP to replace Edward O'Donohue in the upper house.", "Mr Guy is also dealing with the behaviour of veteran MP Bernie Finn over social media posts comparing Premier Daniel Andrews to the Nazis.", "Mr Guy said all candidates were subject to candidate vetting to ascertain if they were conducting themselves \"in the proper way.\""]
